endpoints.description: Retrieve real-time pricing insights for a specific property based on its ID or address.
Submit property attributes and receive an estimated current market value.
Retrieve the latest market trends and data by region.
Fetch a list of comparable properties for a specified property.
Get detailed regional statistics influencing property valuations.
Update user preferences for notifications and updates on property market changes.
Obtain recommendations for properties based on market insights and user-defined criteria.
Search for properties using advanced filters like price range, area, and type.
Submit feedback or queries regarding the service and its reports.
Access a help center detailing usage guidelines and available features of the service.
